info.name: IFMP Forum Universal Theme v1
info.description: Changes the look of Infinite Truckers MP's Forum, to be better to read or making it look nicer I suppose.
info.additionalInfo:
Update 11th March 2020 - FIRST RELEASE
 - Changed width of main forum page
 - Playername in header/banner is now semi-transparent
 - Font is now bolder for the playername in header.
